column5: Mr Minnow Man can you tell me if the Bug River is open
I saw pictures from my friends at Five Lakes Lodge. Its opening up!
it is open from the poplar point lake to the mouth of gullrock. the suckers aren't running in full force yet so I don't think the northerns are in the bug yet in big numbers.
May 13, around 5 p.m. I'll look for lawn chair tracks and cigar ashes at the side of Bug River, near the bridge.
